entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
